backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing photo CRUD operations (add, delete, get, getAll) with authentication checks that reject anonymous callers, using Map storage and blob-storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two authentication requirements (upload and delete) for MediaGallery component with high confidence and test IDs REQ-30 and REQ-31.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 19 frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and configuration files for a portfolio application with photo gallery functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component states.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, title 'Meghana Jha Portfolio', and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component wrapping the Home page with ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, QueryClientProvider, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact card component displaying phone number (+91 7879010587) and email (meghana250306@gmail.com) with icons and clickable links.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Education timeline displaying three academic entries (BSc at BCAS, Class XII, Class X) with grades, dates, and special highlighting for Class X top 1.5% achievement.
frontend/src/components/HackathonConcept: Detailed showcase of TrackEd, the EduThon 2025 winning project, including problem statement, solution overview, six key features, and expected impact sections.
frontend/src/components/Hobbies.tsx: Hobbies card displaying six interests (Article Writing, Journal Writing, Novel reading, Poetry, Chess, Painting) in a two-column grid with icons.
frontend/src/components/Languages.tsx: Languages proficiency card showing English (95% Fluent), Hindi (100% Native), and Sanskrit (70% Learned) with progress bars.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component providing sticky header with navigation links, contact icons (email/phone), main content area, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Photo gallery component with Internet Identity authentication, supporting photo upload with progress tracking, deletion with confirmation dialog, and grid display of all photos with lightbox view.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Profile section displaying a brief bio for a Biomedical Science student seeking clinical laboratory experience and professional growth opportunities.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsInternsh: Displays projects, internships, and achievements (including EduThon 2025 winner, hospital internship, publications) along with a list of academic activities and skills demonstrations.
frontend/src/components/References.tsx: Card component listing three academic references from BCAS professors with their names, titles, and email contact information.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Skills section displaying a collection of technical and soft skills (Excel, lab techniques, research, collaboration, etc.) as interactive badges in a centered grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePhoto.ts: React Query mutation hook for deleting photos via the backend actor, automatically invalidating the photos query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, identity state, and login status tracking with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaUpload.ts: Hook providing photo upload functionality with progress tracking, converting files to ExternalBlob format, calling backend actor to store photos, and invalidating cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching individual photos, all photos, and invalidating photo queries using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a sophisticated earth-tone color scheme with teal accents for both light and dark modes, plus base styling for smooth scrolling and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main homepage component with hero section featuring profile photo and multiple content sections (Profile, Education, Projects, Skills, Contact, etc.) organized in a single-page layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather, JetBrains Mono), OKLCH color system, container settings, shadows, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a portfolio website for Meghana Jha with known issues around photo display and authentication, listing existing features for profile sections, education, projects, skills, and media gallery.
